title: Internet access using Wi-Fi with a static IP address
answer:
Touch Settings > WI-FI, select a hotspot, and on the displayed dialog box, select Show advanced options. Set IP settings to Static, and in most cases, set IP address to 192.168.1.*** and Gateway to 192.168.1.1. Then set Network prefix length, DNS 1, and DNS 2

The process for a mobile device to obtain a dynamic IP address when connected to a router and then gain the access to the Internet using Wi-Fi is time consuming. By using a static IP address, your phone can quickly access the Internet through a Wi-Fi connection.
